verses.text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus by God’s will — sending love and peace to the squad in Ephesus.
Grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus. Big energy, for real.
Blessed be God, the Father of our Lord Jesus — He hooked us up with every spiritual blessing in heavenly realms.
God picked us before the world began, holy and flawless in His eyes, set us up to be adopted as His kids.
He did it through Jesus, according to His plan, to flex His own will and purpose.
This was all for His glory — He’s always about that glory.
Through Jesus, we got redemption — our sins canceled out — and full forgiveness by His grace.
God poured His crazy lavish grace on us, full-on wisdom and understanding energy.
He revealed to us the mystery of His will — what He planned all along in Christ.
The plan? To unite everything in heaven and earth under Christ. Full squad energy.
In Him we got our inheritance — chosen according to His plan, so He can do what He wants.
We exist to flex His glory — we hope and trust in Christ before Him.
You heard the gospel, believed it, and got sealed with the Holy Spirit — guaranteed deposit of what’s coming.
The Spirit is a promise of our inheritance, ensuring we hit that ultimate flex on the Last Day.
That’s why I keep thanking God for y’all, remembering you in my prayers.
I pray the Spirit gives you wisdom and revelation in knowing Him — full knowledge, no cap.
That your hearts get lit up to understand the hope He called you to.
To grasp the insane wealth of God’s inheritance for His saints.
To see how unreal God’s power is for us believers — like resurrection-level strength, working in Christ.
This same power raised Jesus from the dead and sat Him at God’s right hand in heavenly realms.
Above every rule, authority, power, dominion, and every name you can name — past, present, or future.
God put everything under His feet and made Him head over the church,
Which is His body — full unity, full control, full glory.
Yo, you used to be dead in your sins, vibing with the world, following the devil’s energy.
He was running the show — the spirit of disobedience in everyone, just living for the hype, not God.
All of us were once living like that, chasing fleshly cravings, angry, greedy — full squad against God.
But God, rich in mercy, big love energy,
Made us alive with Christ even when we were dead — total glow-up by grace. You got saved.
He raised us with Him, seated us with Jesus in heavenly realms — next-level access, no flex.
That He might show in ages to come the insane riches of His grace toward us in Christ.
Facts: you got saved by grace, not by works — no one can flex and claim credit.
Not by works — it’s a gift, fam, so nobody can clout chase over you.
We are God’s masterpiece, created in Christ Jesus for good works He prepared beforehand — live them out, don’t ghost.
Yo, remember your past? You were separate from Christ, excluded from Israel’s squad, strangers to covenants, no hope, no God.
Now? You who were once far have been brought near by the blood of Christ.
He’s our bridge — peace energy connecting Jews and Gentiles in one squad.
Jesus broke down the wall — hate, division, rules — in His flesh. He made peace.
He united both groups into one new person — ending hostility,
And through the cross, He killed the beef between them, bringing God and humans together.
He came and preached peace to y’all far away and those near — full squad gospel.
Through Him, we both have access to the Father by one Spirit — VIP pass.
So no longer strangers or outsiders, we’re now citizens with the saints and part of God’s household.
Built on apostles and prophets, Christ Jesus is the cornerstone — solid, unshakeable.
In Him, the whole building grows into a holy temple in the Lord.
You too are being built together into God’s dwelling, full of Spirit vibes.
Yo, it’s Paul — lowkey locked up for Christ, but trust, I’m on a divine mission, no chill.
God slid me a secret, mad hidden before — now it’s fully out, big energy.
Gentiles? Yeah, they’re officially part of the squad — full inclusion, no exclusions.
Through the Spirit, I can spill the blueprint — God’s plan for humanity unlocked.
It was ghosted from past generations, but now? Revealed. Major glow-up.
The mystery? Gentiles share the same inheritance, same body, same promise in Christ — we all one fam.
I got mad grace to preach this — dropping knowledge on the hidden plan, no cap.
Me? The tiniest apostle ever, but God’s grace hit hard — now I’m grinding full-time.
My job: show everyone the hidden mystery God had from the jump.
Spiritual powers, heavenly squads? They see God’s wisdom flexed through the church — totally cosmic energy.
His eternal plan? Fully executed in Christ Jesus — all things finally make sense.
Through Him, we approach God confident, no gatekeeping, no awkward vibes.
So don’t get shook by my jail sitch — it’s all part of God’s ultimate grind.
I drop to my knees, hands up in heaven’s energy.
For the squad — every family in heaven and on earth — God gets mad glory.
Pray He fills you with power through His Spirit, deep in your inner core.
Christ vibing in your heart, anchoring you in love, stable, unshakeable.
Rooted, grounded — love maxed, faith un-wobbly, fully stacked.
Feel it: width, length, height, depth of God’s love — impossible to measure, but fully lit.
God can do insane things beyond imagination, through Christ — ultimate power move.
To Him be eternal glory in the church, in Christ Jesus — forever. No cap. Amen.
Yo, I, Paul, lowkey chained, but I’m calling y’all to live worthy — squad vibes, humble and chill.
Stay patient, loving each other, keep the peace — unity energy unlocked.
One squad, one Spirit, one baptism, one God — all for the same glory.
One Lord, one faith, one hope — don’t get it twisted.
God’s squad is bigger than you think — all part of the same mission.
Grace flows from the Father to everyone — no exceptions, full drip.
Each of us gets grace in different measures — God flexing diversity.
He ascended, led captives, gave gifts to the squad — full energy pass-down.
Ascension flex: He went up high, and took low-key spirits along.
Now He gives leaders — apostles, prophets, evangelists, pastors, teachers — to squad up.
Their job? Equip the squad, prepare the saints for full mission vibes.
Build the squad, reach maturity — no more baby believers wobbling.
Then we all grow, full stature of Christ — max level.
No more being tossed by vibes, tricks, or fake news.
Speak truth in love — every word hits, no cap.
Body vibes together — every part works, grows, builds up, stable squad energy.
Drop the old vibes — no more lying, no deceit, no fake clout.
Mind reset: don’t wander in darkness, ignorance, hype without truth.
Past life? Full chaos — greed, anger, empty chatter.
But now? Learn Christ, do truth, speak life.
Don’t let old ways ghost you; put off old self — full unlearn.
Put on the new self — renewed in knowledge, God energy maxed.
Think right, live right, squad goals synced with Creator.
Put off lying, slander, corrupt talk — chat light, truth tight.
Don’t steal — work with hands, flex for giving, not flexing.
Don’t let anger run wild; don’t let sun set on beef.
Ghost revenge — leave it to God, squad peace maintained.
Don’t let corrupt talk spill — only words that build up.
Don’t grieve the Spirit — He’s your squad anchor.
Kill old vibes — bitterness, rage, slander, toxic energy.
Be kind, tender, forgiving — God forgave you, now you flex it too.
Wrap it all up in love — perfect squad energy, full Christ flex.
Squad up, fam — be imitators of God, full-on love flex, just like Christ.
Walk the love lane — it’s the ultimate energy move, full sacrifice, full vibe.
Keep it clean — no filth, greed, or cap in talk; nothing shady, nothing wild.
No foolish chatter, no lame jokes — keep it wholesome, Spirit-aligned.
Know this: greed and impurity have zero inheritance in God’s squad.
Don’t get tricked — God’s wrath hits hard on liars and frauds.
Don’t play with shadows — no part in darkness, no links to fake vibes.
Once y’all were lost, now you’re lit in the Lord — walk as light flexers.
Light produces every goodness, righteousness, and truth — glow-up mode.
Peep what pleases the Lord — test every move, every vibe.
Don’t roll with dark vibes; expose the fake, call it out.
What’s hidden? Expose it. Stop ignoring it; shine light.
Darkness gets exposed by the light — all secrets revealed.
Wake up, squad! Rise from sleep — Christ’s light is coming, energy flex!
Watch your step — live smart, not dumb.
Time’s tight, don’t waste it; maximize every chance, full purpose.
Don’t be idiots — understand the Lord’s will, squad focus.
Don’t get wasted on booze — get full Spirit, full energy.
Sing psalms, hymns, spiritual songs — vibe in your heart to the Lord.
Give thanks always — God sees your grind, recognizes your flex.
Submit to each other — squad synergy in reverence to Christ.
Wives, vibe with your husbands — Spirit respect, not blind cap.
Husbands, lead like Christ — love the squad like His body, no half-stepping.
Wives, your husband is the head, same as Christ is head of Church — respect, no disrespect.
Husbands, love your wives like Christ — sacrifice fully, no cap.
Sanctify the squad, cleanse with truth — spiritual glow-up.
Present the squad spotless — full holy energy, zero flaws.
Husbands, love your wives like your own body — selfless vibes.
No one hates their own body — care, feed, protect.
Christ loves the Church — nourishes and cherishes like His own.
That’s why man leaves, clings, squad unity — one flesh, one energy.
Deep mystery alert: this flex is about Christ and the Church — mind-blown.
Husbands and wives? Love and respect, full Spirit synergy, full squad energy.
Kids, vibe with your parents — respect, obey, it’s the move in the Lord.
Honor your fam — long life, max blessing, no cap.
Parents, don’t snap or roast your kids — raise ‘em right, full patience.
Work vibes: slaves, obey your bosses like the Lord, no fake flex.
Do it from the heart — serve like it’s Christ you’re flexing for, not humans.
Don’t just do it when watched — deep-down, real Spirit energy.
Masters, treat your crew right — fairness over flexing or threats.
God sees everything — nothing ghosted, every action logged.
Squad, suit up — we’re in a battle, not just chill mode.
God’s power is your full flex — He makes you strong.
Armor up, fam — stand firm against the devil’s tricks.
Our fight? Not just humans, it’s spiritual — rulers, powers, forces of darkness.
So grab the full armor — stand your ground, no cap retreat.
Belt of truth tight, chestplate of righteousness locked.
Feet shod with readiness from the gospel — step firm, move fast.
Shield of faith — block every flaming arrow, every fake vibe.
Helmet of salvation, sword of Spirit — Word of God fully loaded.
Pray constantly — all times, every angle, Spirit on full alert.
Pray for me too — boldness in dropping God’s truth.
I’m locked up, but pray I speak clean, no filter, Spirit guided.
Tychicus? I’m sending him — he’ll flex updates and encourage your squad.
Peace be with the fam in Christ — grace to all the believers.
I, Paul, send my signature, full squad love.
Grace be with you all — final flex, no cap, eternal drip.
